class.name: Kodot2Body
class.brief_description: A body tracked by the Kinect v2.
class.description: A body tracked by the Kinect v2. Contains data such as the skeletal joint positions in 2D/3D.

method.name: getJointPositions2D
method.description: Returns joint positions as an array of Vector2's. [b]NOTE:[/b] Will be empty or inaccurate if this body isn't currently tracked.

method.name: getJointPositions3D
method.description: Returns joint positions as an array of Vector3's. [b]NOTE:[/b] Will be empty or inaccurate if this body isn't currently tracked.
